sqlMap.select: SELECT A.MENU_ID, A.MENU_NAME, A.UP_MENU_ID, A.PROGRM_URL FROM IS_MENU A, SM_PRIVGRP_PRIV B WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID AND (B.INQIRE_YN = 'Y' OR B.WRITE_YN = 'Y') AND B.PRIVGRP_SN = #privgrp_sn# ORDER BY A.SORT_ORDER

SELECT A.MENU_ID, A.INQIRE_YN, A.WRITE_YN, B.MENU_NAME, B.UP_MENU_ID, B.PROGRM_URL FROM SM_PRIVGRP_PRIV A, IS_MENU B WHERE A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID AND (A.INQIRE_YN = 'Y' OR A.WRITE_YN = 'Y') AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.PRIVGRP_SN = #privgrp_sn#
AND B.UP_MENU_ID IN ( SELECT UP_MENU_ID FROM IS_MENU WHERE PROGRM_URL LIKE CONCAT('%', #progrm_url#, '%') )
ORDER BY B.SORT_ORDER
SELECT A.MENU_NAME AS UP_MENU_NAME, B.UP_MENU_ID, B.MENU_NAME, B.MENU_ID FROM IS_MENU A, IS_MENU B WHERE A.MENU_ID = B.UP_MENU_ID AND B.PROGRM_URL LIKE CONCAT('%', #progrm_url#, '%')
SELECT A.INQIRE_YN, A.WRITE_YN FROM SM_PRIVGRP_PRIV A, IS_MENU B WHERE A.PRIVGRP_SN = #privgrp_sn# AND A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID AND B.PROGRM_URL LIKE CONCAT('%', #progrm_url#, '%')
